Articles.Content:
I know there is a way to edit the files and add ablatives to a fairing, but would it not be nice to see an abative fairing in the stock game? One that is alot heavier and expensive but really usefull for sending payloads to the surface of planets or for supersonic planes.

To balance it out, i think it would be appropriate for the ablative heatshield to ablate and destroy itself faster than regular heatshields, so it does not become too over powered.
They could totally do this with the new texture switch feature coming.
